title: 220509 - DP - Best Of
itunes:title: 220509 - DP - Best Of
description:
On the Monday edition of The Dan Patrick Show: Doug and Ryan, filling in for Dan, discuss the incident Sunday night that resulted in a Mavericks' fan being removed from the game after supposedly putting his hands on Chris Paul's family member. Doug and Ryan, filling in for Dan, talk about the huge upset in the Kentucky Derby as Rich Strike won the race as an 80-1 underdog.  Doug and Ryan discuss the 76ers' series-tying win over Miami Sunday night and how well James Harden did in that win.  Doug and Ryan talk about how watchable the Mavs-Suns games are with all of the dramatic reactions to calls and non-calls. Ja Morant hurt his knee in game three, Doug and Ryan discuss how they think he was injured and what it means now that Morant is likely out for game four.  

 

#DougGottliebShow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
